alert.note: Alert for Arco, Mud Lake Desert; Lost River Range; Lost River Valleys (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 3:07PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORM WITH POSSIBLE WIND AND HAIL MOVING ACROSS NORTHERN PORTIONS OF IDAHO NATIONAL LABORATORY... At 305 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles northwest of Central INL, or 13 miles east of Arco, moving east at 20 MPH. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 MPH and penny size hail. Wind gusted to 46 MPH in Arco at 235 PM with this storm. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Central INL and Southeast INL. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. If you observe hail or wind damage, please report your observations to the National Weather Service in Pocatello via phone, email, or social media, as soon as it is safe to do so.

area.areaDesc: Arco, Mud Lake Desert; Lost River Range; Lost River Valleys
